Verses: 1 aattukkuttiyaanavar Muththiraigalil Ondrai Udaikkakkanden. Appozhudhu Naangu Jeevangalil Ondru Ennai Nokki: Nee Vandhu Paar Endru Idimuzhakkampondra Saththamaaich Sollakketten.

2 naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Oru Vellaikkudhiraiyaik Kanden; Adhinmel Eriyirundhavan Villaip Pidiththirundhaan; Avanukku Oru Kireedang Kodukkappattadhu; Avan Jeyikkiravanaagavum Jeyippavanaagavum Purappattaan.
3 avar Irandaam Muththiraiyai Udaiththapodhu, Irandaam Jeevanaanadhu: Nee Vandhupaar Endru Sollakketten.

4 appozhudhu Sivappaana Veroru Kudhirai Purappattadhu; Adhinmel Eriyirundhavanukku, Boomiyilullavargal Oruvaraiyoruvar Kolaiseyyaththakkadhaagach Samaadhaanaththaip Boomiyilirundheduththuppodumpadiyaana Adhigaaram Kodukkappattadhu; Oru Periya Pattayamum Avanukkuk Kodukkappattadhu.

5 avar Moondraam Muththiraiyai Udaiththapodhu, Moondraam Jeevanaanadhu: Nee Vandhupaar Endru Sollakketten. Naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Oru Karuppukkudhiraiyaik Kanden; Adhinmel Eriyirundhavan Oru Tharaasaith Than Kaiyile Pidiththirundhaan.

6 appozhudhu, Oru Panaththukku Orupadi Kodhumaiyendrum, Oru Panaththukku Moondrupadi Vaarkodhumaiyendrum, Enneyaiyum Thiraatcharasaththaiyum Sedhappaduththaadhe Endrum, Naangu Jeevangalin Maththiyilirundhu Undaana Saththaththaik Ketten.
7 avar Naalaam Muththiraiyai Udaiththapodhu, Naalaam Jeevanaanadhu: Nee Vandhupaar Endru Sollunj Saththaththaik Ketten.

8 naan Paarththapodhu, Idho, Manginaniramulla Oru Kudhiraiyaik Kanden; Adhinmel Eriyirundhavanukku Maranam Endru Peyar; Paadhaalam Avanpin Sendradhu. Pattayaththinaalum, Panjaththinaalum, Saavinaalum, Boomiyin Dhushtamirugangalinaalum, Boomiyin Kaarpangilullavargalaik Kolaiseyyumpadiyaana Adhigaaram Avaigalukkuk Kodukkappattadhu.
9 avar Aindhaam Muththiraiyai Udaiththapodhu, Dhevavasanaththinimiththamum Thaangal Koduththa Saatchiyinimiththamum Kollappattavargaludaiya Aaththumaakkalaip Balipeedaththinkeezhe Kanden.

10 avargal: Parisuththamum Saththiyamumulla Aandavare, Dhevareer Boomiyinmel Kudiyirukkiravargalidaththil Engal Raththaththaikkuriththu Edhuvaraikkum Niyaayaththeerppuchseyyaamalum Pazhivaangaamalum Iruppeer Endru Magaa Saththamittuk Kooppittaargal.

11 appozhudhu Avargal Ovvoruvarukkum Vellai Angigal Kodukkappattadhu; Andriyum, Avargal Thangalaippolak Kolaiseyyappadappogiravargalaagiya Thangal Udanpanividaikkaararaiyum Thangal Sagodhararumaanavargalin Thogai Niraivaagumalavum Innungonjakkaalam Ilaippaaravendum Endru Avargalukkuch Sollappattadhu.
12 avar Aaraam Muththiraiyai Udaikkakkanden; Idho, Boomi Migavum Adhirndhadhu; Sooriyan Karuppuk Kambaliyaippolak Karuththadhu; Sandhiran Raththampolaayitru.
13 aththimaramaanadhu Perungaatrinaal Asaikkappadumpodhu, Adhin Kaaigal Udhirugiradhupola, Vaanaththin Natchaththirangalum Boomiyile Vizhundhadhu.
14 vaanamum Suruttappatta Pusthagampolaagi Vilagippoyitru; Malaigal Theevugal Yaavum Thangal Idangalaivittu Agandrupoyina.

15 boomiyin Raajaakkalum, Periyorgalum, Aisuvariyavaangalum, Senaiththalaivargalum, Balavaangalum, Adimaigal Yaavarum, Suyaadheenar Yaavarum, Parvadhangalin Kugaigalilum Kanmalaigalilum Olinthukkondu,

16 parvadhangalaiyum Kanmalaigalaiyum Nokki: Neengal Engalmel Vizhundhu, Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkiravarudaiya Mugaththirkum, Aattukkuttiyaanavarudaiya Kobaththirkum Engalai Maraiththukkollungal;
17 avarudaiya Kobaakkinaiyin Magaa Naal Vandhuvittadhu, Yaar Nilainirkakkoodum Endraargal.
